thread.title: Listen to the What Hi-Fi? playlist
thread.title_full: Listen to the What Hi-Fi? playlist

author: Simon Lucas
title: Listen to the What Hi-Fi? playlist
text:
8th February 2017 by Simon Lucas Follow @onlysimonlucas Stay on top of your sound with What Hi-Fi? in your inbox every week Thank you for registering for our Newsletter We will send you relevant emails and updates. Listen to a selection of our favourite tunes and test tracks on our Spotify, Qobuz and Tidal playlists for 2017, updated every month with new tracks. 
If you want an idea of what we've been listening to over the last month or so, then check out our What Hi-Fi? playlist on Spotify , on Tidal and now also on Qobuz . Subscribe to the playlists and you'll never miss an update... 
It's a sample of some of the tunes we've been using to test with and generally enjoying, all wrapped up neatly in a playlist on your favourite streaming service. It's updated every time a new issue goes on sale. 
This month you can enjoy the many and various charms of The xx, Frank Sinatra, Elliott Smith, Sampha, Lambchop and The Czars - and plenty more besides. 
To listen to the playlists, make sure you have Spotify , Tidal or Qobuz installed and then click on the links below to load-up the playlist. Got your own recommendations? Let us know in the comments below. Enjoy!
